definitions.definition: A flower, especially one indicating that a fruit tree is fruiting; a mass of such flowers.
definitions.example: The blossom has come early this year.

definitions.definition: The state or season of producing such flowers.
A blooming period or stage of development; something lovely that gives rich promise.
The colour of a horse that has white hairs intermixed with sorrel and bay hairs.
To have, or open into, blossoms; to bloom.
To begin to thrive or flourish.
